copwire – Copper Wire Data¶

This does a lot.

  1. Copper wire table - metric/inch/AWG
  2. Copper wire table - metric/inch/BSWG
  3. Copper wire properties
  4. Current carrying capacity of AWG sizes of copper wire
  5. Current carrying capacity of printed circuit board traces
  6. DC resistance of copper wire
  7. RF resistance of copper wire & skin effect
  8. Stranded copper wire (AWG Standard)
  9. Voltage drop in long wire runs
  10. Weight of copper wire
  11. Wire size conversions - metric/inch/AWG
  12. Wire size conversions - AWG/BSWG
  13. Wire table - enameled copper wire
